FIELD.NAME: format
FIELD.COMMENT: upload / text / spreadsheet / wordprocessor / presentation

FIELD.NAME: initialtext
FIELD.COMMENT: Initial text, if 'text' format selected

FIELD.NAME: display
FIELD.COMMENT: current / new

FIELD.NAME: width
FIELD.COMMENT: iframe width - 0 for auto

FIELD.NAME: height
FIELD.COMMENT: iframe height - 0 for auto

FIELD.NAME: displayname
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the name be displayed on the view page?

FIELD.NAME: displaydescription
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the description be displayed on the view page?

FIELD.NAME: collaboraid
FIELD.COMMENT: The collabora instance this relates to

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group this document relates to

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: Has this document been locked as read-only except to those with mod/collabora:editlocked?

FIELD.NAME: watermark_text
FIELD.COMMENT: The watermark to show on the document, if any.

FIELD.NAME: enable_owner_termination
FIELD.COMMENT: When enabled, the document is closed for everyone when the owner closes the document.

FIELD.NAME: disable_print
FIELD.COMMENT: Disables printing the document.

FIELD.NAME: disable_export
FIELD.COMMENT: Disables exporting the document to different formats.

FIELD.NAME: disable_copy
FIELD.COMMENT: Disables copying text and other embedded elements from the document.

FIELD.NAME: enable_insert_remote_image
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls whether inserting remote images is allowed.

FIELD.NAME: disable_change_tracking_record
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls whether or not change-tracking is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: disable_change_tracking_show
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls whether or not change-tracking markers are visible.

FIELD.NAME: hide_change_tracking_controls
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls whether or not change-tracking controls (to enable/disable and show/hide change-tracking) are visible.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user in question

FIELD.NAME: token
FIELD.COMMENT: The user's access token
